data.what_is: BizConnector offers marketing and workflow automation solutions to small businesses.
data.product_description: BizConnector offers marketing and workflow automation solutions to small businesses.

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about BizConnector?
I love the BizConnector's categorization of  layers of priority that seamlessly factors in cost management which attributes to cost efficiency and productivity.

What do you dislike about BizConnector?
Offshoring and the barriers that exist with that.   The perceived value of service is lower.

What problems is BizConnector solving and how is that benefiting you?
Efficiently outsourced IT solution for the workforce to utilize.   Assuming there are no critical issue all seems pretty good and smooth.

review_question_answers.answer: Efficiently outsourced IT solution for the workforce to utilize.   Assuming there are no critical issue all seems pretty good and smooth.

initial_reviews.review_title: The greatest thing about BizConnector is their customer support.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about BizConnector?
BizConnector is really helpful in setting up campaigns that respond to what our target audience is doing. Whenever we had any issues, the customer support of BizConnector helped us to sort them out easily. Beyond amazing services, BizConnector's pricing is also fair. In comparison to the other big marketing automation apps, BizConnector's price is just a fraction of them and this makes BizConnector extra awesome.

What do you dislike about BizConnector?
I have been using BizConnector for years and I did not find any downsides of using it.

What problems is BizConnector solving and how is that benefiting you?
BizConnector helps us with marketing automation, ad management, contact management, and drip marketing.

In comparison to the other big marketing automation apps, BizConnector's price is just a fraction of them and this makes BizConnector extra awesome.

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: Digital Marketing Executive | Paid Ads Specialist

initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about BizConnector?
Email Reminder is one of the best option available in this. Alert is also good.

What do you dislike about BizConnector?
It is not complex and integration with other tools except email reminder, gmail and Salesforce is not that good.

What problems is BizConnector solving and how is that benefiting you?
Email Reminder to customers using BizConnector solved many of the problems.
